title: i want to join the competition
body:
my clan called NIDK wants to join the opl but how ???? we are very motivated and good pleas tell me how me could sign up
thanks in advance

replies.body:
The first step is to become a top team in the OOL - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/PddvamI2-oceanic-open-ladder-returns-for-split-2?utm_source=LeagueClient&utm_medium=OverviewTier1

Then you will get promoted to the OCS and if you do well there you have a chance to knock out a OPL team for their spot.
I think there are rank requirement to join, what rank are you guys place at in flex or solo Q?
